statement.p: An unknown radioactive element decays into non-radioactive substances. In \displaystyle{540} days the radioactivity of a sample decreases by \displaystyle{50} percent.
(a) What is the half-life of the element?
(b) How long will it take for a sample of \displaystyle{100} mg to decay to \displaystyle{86} mg?
